nodes.bodyText: I think we should pull this checking out of membership. Even if we leave this marker in, the javadocs above don't really describe what this is doing or why someone would add this marker to a message.

nodes.bodyText: I'd be happy with pulling this out, maybe on a separate ticket...?

nodes.bodyText: Should we remove this whole catch block? If it was good to propage GemFireConfigException up, maybe we should do that for IllegalStateException as well?
we could do that... only action we took was to potentially log a small message...
